instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: MacBook pro 13 inch  2018 unresponsive touch bar
threads.message: hello guys , have got a MacBook pro 13 inch  2018 unresponsive touch bar . The touch bar would not respond, I then replace the top casing which includes the touch bar , but still does not respond to touch , though it lights up.. No liquid damage. was only swapping out the screen .

threads.title: MacBook pro 13 inch  2018 unresponsive touch bar
threads.message:
Touchbar was working before replace the screen?
If yes, put back all and try again.

threads.title: MacBook pro 13 inch  2018 unresponsive touch bar
threads.message: yes , did put back the old screen but still nothing , it does  display , but would not respond to touch

threads.title: MacBook pro 13 inch  2018 unresponsive touch bar
threads.message:
Please reply with new post, instead of a comment.

If touchbar was working before replace the LCD assembly, you did something wrong in the process.
Check if all connectors are good, look for bent pins, broken traces...

threads.title: MacBook pro 13 inch  2018 unresponsive touch bar
threads.message: thank you so much , L5001 was OL , which is a 5V line to the touch panel , replaced it and it works fine ..
